# quotes
Share your favorite quote with the community!! 

# how to contribute? ðŸ˜Ž

1. fork this repository
2. clone it
3. create a txt and put your favorite quote with the language that you prefer (English, Italian, etc) and the author of the quote and name the file with your GitHub username
5. commit and push
6. open a pull request

**this repo contributes to hactoberfest 2021!!!**
